InteractionBehaviourBaseÂ¶

class Leap::Unity::Interaction::InteractionBehaviourBase

InteractionBehaviourBase is a utility class that implements the IInteractionBehaviour interface.

This class aims to provide the minimum set of behaviours that can be generalized to most interaction objects, and no more. The aim is to provide a class that takes care of the ‘bookkeeping’ needed to properly interface with the InteractionManager component, so that implementing different types of InteractionBehaviours becomes easier.

This behaviour has the following features:

This behaviour has the following requirements:

Public Functions

override bool IsBeingGraspedByHand(int handId)

Returns whether or not a hand with the given ID is currently grasping this object.

override sealed void NotifyHandGrasped(Hand hand)

Called by InteractionManager when a Hand begins grasping this object.

override sealed void NotifyHandLostTracking(Hand oldHand, out float maxSuspensionTime)

Called by InteractionManager when a Hand that was grasping becomes untracked.

The Hand is not yet considered ungrasped, and OnHandRegainedTracking might be called in the future if the Hand becomes tracked again.

override sealed void NotifyHandRegainedTracking(Hand newHand, int oldId)

Called by InteractionManager when a grasping Hand that had previously been untracked has regained tracking.

The new hand is provided, as well as the id of the previously tracked hand.

override sealed void NotifyHandReleased(Hand hand)

Called by InteractionManager when a Hand stops grasping this object.

override sealed void NotifyHandsHoldGraphics(ReadonlyList < Hand > hands)

Called by InteractionManager every frame that a Hand continues to grasp this object.

This callback is invoked both in LateUpdate.

override sealed void NotifyHandsHoldPhysics(ReadonlyList < Hand > hands)

Called by InteractionManager every frame that a Hand continues to grasp this object.

This callback is invoked both in FixedUpdate.

override sealed void NotifyHandTimeout(Hand oldHand)

Called by InteractionManager when an untracked grasping Hand has remained ungrasped for too long.

The hand is no longer considered to be grasping the object.

override sealed void NotifyInteractionShapeCreated(INTERACTION_SHAPE_INSTANCE_HANDLE instanceHandle)

Called by InteractionManager when the interaction shape associated with this InteractionBehaviour is created and added to the interaction scene.

override sealed void NotifyInteractionShapeDestroyed()

Called by InteractionManager when the interaction shape associated with this InteractionBehaviour is destroyed and removed from the interaction scene.

override sealed void NotifyPostSolve()

Called by InteractionManager after all solving is performed.

override sealed void NotifyPreSolve()

Called by InteractionManager before any solving is performed.

override sealed void NotifyRecievedSimulationResults(INTERACTION_SHAPE_INSTANCE_RESULTS results)

Called by InteractionManager when simulation results are available for this object.

override sealed void NotifyRegistered()

Called by InteractionManager when the behaviour is successfully registered with the manager.

override sealed void NotifyUnregistered()

Called by InteractionManager when the behaviour is unregistered with the manager.

override void Validate()

Called to validate the state of the object.
